transform_def.name: designed36
transform_def.string: let r = 1 / length(p_in) s = tan(length(p_in) + tan(abs(sin(p_in.x))) + abs(fmod(p_in.x, p_in.y) * twopi()) * sin(length(p_in) + tan(abs(p_in.x) - abs(p_in.y))) + abs(p_in.x) * sin(abs(p_in.y))) z = tan((tan(fmod(abs(p_in.x + p_in.y) + abs(p_in.x - p_in.y), length(p_in))) * s) * r) con1 = abs(z) < r con2 = abs(z) > r in (if if fill > 0.0 then con1 else con2 then p_in else vec2(0.0)) * weight
